@graph.name: How To Leverage Entities & OptizenAI For Rich Shopify Product Descriptions At Scale
@graph.description: The following is the process of using OptizenAI to extract entities to use in Shopify product descriptions, and build enriched description content for individual, small, or large groups of products. The Prompt TL:DR Version (How To Use This Prompt) Where To Use This AI Prompt This prompt is specific to the product description of Shopify […]

step.name: Extract entities from Wikipedia
step.text: Use ChatGPT 4 Plus to extract entities from Wikipedia pages for brands or product types that will be used in the OptizenAI prompt

step.name: Navigate to product tab
step.text: Go to the product tab in Optizen AI and search for products by name or tags, then select products using checkboxes

step.name: Select PAS Framework prompt
step.text: Choose the PAS Framework - Entities - Internal Links prompt from the dropdown, check the Update this section box, and replace square bracket sections with specific use case information

step.name: Run the prompt
step.text: Click Proceed to execute the prompt, then check the output in the Log section and choose to keep or restore the update
